General.Name: Tecnotree Oyj
General.Description: Tecnotree Oyj provides telecommunication IT solutions products and services for charging, billing, customer care, and messaging and content services in the, Europe and the Americas, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and the Asia Pacific region. The company's product portfolio comprises a range of business management solutions for digital service providers, as well as a range of order-to-cash of business process and subscription management for telecom and other digital service providers. Its solutions include Digital BSS Suite that comprises various business support solutions for the telecom industry, including customer, revenue, enterprise management, and VAS services. The company also offers digital delivery and DevOps, managed, maintenance and support, and consulting services. Tecnotree Oyj was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Espoo, Finland.
